result.short_description: Request a category that you can use to create your own catalog items
result.description:
Item Designer category requests allow you to request a new category within the catalog. Once created, you will be able to create and publish items that allow users to request products and services.

For each item, you will be able to define:

  • the questions the user must complete to submit the request
  • approvals that must be completed for the request to progress to fulfillment
  • at least 1 task that will be used to fulfill the request

By filling out this request, you or your designate will be the manager of the item designer category.  You can also assign editors who will also have permission to create/update items within this category.

Once this request is fulfilled and the category is created, you will be notified via email and sent a link to begin creating your items.
result.name: Item Designer Category Request

result.short_description:
OS X Yosemite (version 10.10.x) is Apple's eleventh
			major release of OS X, for Macs
result.description:
IT Support will contact you to schedule the upgrade!

OS X Yosemite (version 10.10) is the eleventh major release of OS X, Apple Inc.'s desktop and server operating system.

Yosemite introduced a revision to the operating system's user interface. Its graphics are inspired by iOS 7. It still maintains the OS X desktop metaphor. The interface incorporates a flatter visual appearance with blurred translucency effects.

Other design changes include new icons, light and dark color schemes, and the replacement of Lucida Grande with Helvetica Neue as the default system font. The dock is now a 2D translucent rectangle instead of a skeuomorphic glass shelf, reminiscent of the dock design used in early versions of OS X through Tiger.
result.name: OS X Yosemite

The unit also offers a large paper handling of up to 250 pages in a front-loading cassette and provides duplex output for printing professional-quality documents.

Networkable

result.description:

  • Matte TPU and Polycarbonate for drop and scratch protection
  • Slim and form fitted to show the perfect shape of your device

result.description:
The Neo Hybrid Series™ is composed of UV coated hard polycarbonate frame combining onto the high polymer coated soft premium cover. With both soft and hard properties of polycarbonate and soft cover, the Neo Hybrid provides strong protection for your device while maintaining a sleek bumper style look.

  • Combination of TPU and Polycarbonate for drop and scratch protection
  • Slim and form fitted to show the perfect shape of your device
  • Metalized polycarbonate control buttons for a stylish look
  • Advanced Shock Absorption Technology: Web Pattern TPU case
result.name: Spigen Samsung GS5 Case

result.description:
The all-new Slim Armor S is designed for ultimate protection while maintaining its minimalistic look and feel. The redesigned TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane) inner lining is softer but delivers better button response and improves impact protection and shock absorption with its strategically designed spider-webbed interior. The also redesigned outer polycarbonate midsection has an improved matte finish coating that offers better grip and feel.

  • Slimmer form-fitted design for the iPhone 5S / 5
  • Two toned colors with a metallic finish
  • TPU case wrapped in polycarbonate outer midsection for extra protection
  • Compatible with Apple Earpods, and earbuds with L-shaped plug (within 6.17mm diameter)
result.name: Spigen iPhone 5/5s Case

result.description:
Main Features

  • Fast color output. With a print speed up to 25ppm in both color and black, you no longer hav e to wait for brilliant color output.
  • Easily print two-sided documents. Using the color laser printer's duplex printing feature, you can help reduce your printing costs and produce two-sided documents, presentations and brochures.
  • Built-in Networking. Share the HL-4150CDN with everyone on your network via its built-in Ethernet network interface.
  • Flexible paper handling. Use the 250-sheet capacity paper tray for letter or legal paper. Plus, a 50-sheet capacity multi-purpose tray for envelopes or thicker media.
  • Brother™ iPrint&Scan. Free app download for wireless printing (JPEG, PDF, web page & e-mail) from your Apple®, Android™ or Windows® Phone 7 (JPEG only) mobile device
result.name: Brother Network-Ready Color Laser Printer

result.short_description:
High-speed, lightweight backups with Global
			deduplication
result.description:
inSync delivers high-speed, lightweight backups with Global deduplication that produces smaller, faster backups by eliminating data redundancy across all users. InSync ensures your critical data is protected wherever it resides.

  • Continuous backup: Continuous data protection with anytime, anywhere access via native client, web, and mobile maximize productivity
  • Persona Backup: preserves personal settings for easy managed OS migration or device reprovisioning
  • Immediate access: to data from any device minimizing downtime and maximizing user productivity
  • Auto-resume: ensures data is transferred without starting over, eliminating frustration and keeping data protected
result.name: Druva inSync, for Mac & PC

result.short_description:
OS X Mavericks (version 10.9.x) is Apple's tenth
			major release of OS X, for Macs
result.description:
Contact IT Support, for FREE upgrade!! (onsite presence required)

 

OS X Mavericks (version 10.9.x) is the tenth major release of OS X, Apple Inc.'s desktop and server operating system for Macintosh computers. OS X Mavericks was announced on June 10, 2013, at WWDC 2013, and was released on October 22, 2013, as a free update through the Mac App Store worldwide.
result.name: OS X Mavericks
